data.text:
@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta @thevivafrei More technical issues in Quebec today.
https://t.co/0EbBxldtrM

@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta Seems Quebec having technical issues today.
https://t.co/pzVLol4lYX

@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta Hinshaw is like a cancer..just when you thinks its gone it pops its ugly head up again!
I think many of these Medical Officers of Health are batshit crazy! 
Its the same damn virus but you've got ten different MOH doing ten different things to combat the virus. 
To jail!!
@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta So, Trudeau’s childish name calling of protesters in Ottawa is due to a Technical Issue.  Oh ok.  Silly me thinking politicians should be held to a much higher standard.
@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta Technical as in “technically, they are all liars”.
@Skrotar @thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta Exactly. They manipulate data by excluding pertinent details.
@biogirl444 @thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta I'm much more of a skeptic. They dig up tragic stories & manipulate the details in order to impact people's emotions. It's calculated.

@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta they will all stand and face the Living God on that day. 

there will be wespinv and gnashing of teeth in anguish. Their money won't save them on the day of Judgement. Woe to you!
@thevivafrei @CMOH_Alberta Sadly for so many it goes right down the memory hole.
